name: Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules
description:
Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules

Shedding flab off your body can be a daunting task and especially if you are an obese or extremely overweight. However, this task has to be accomplished because obesity is the cause of various cardiovascular issues and diabetes. Nutrex Lipo-6 Black capsules will catalyse your workout plan and lets you achieve your weight loss goals in the given time frame. The powerful unflavoured dietary supplement has a high potency, so one pill is enough to create the ripples inside your body. With so many weight-loss formulas in the market.

Benefits

Bitter Orange Extract: Fat Burner

Nutrex Lipo-6 Black Ultra Concentrate (UC) capsules Unflavoured by MPN are so powerful that just one pill a day is enough to blast off that fat off your body, albeit at a steady speed. The supplement is enriched with the properties of Advantra Z Citrus Aurantium that delivers the goodness of bitter orange extract, which as a result aids in faster weight loss. Moreover, the ingredient controls appetite and thereby helps you manage your portion intake and weight loss progress.

Theobromine Anhydrous-The ‘Push Your Limits’ Benefits

Another amazing ingredient in Nutrex Lipo-6 Black (UC) capsules is Theobromine Anhydrous increases mental focus during your training sessions and supports muscle recovery. The compound is similar to caffeine with an only difference for the time the latter stays in the body. In addition to this, Theobromine widens the blood vessels for proper blood and oxygen flow during exercise sessions. The vasodilatation property plays a key role in reducing fat from your body by giving you ample amount of energy to infuse in your training sessions.

Ingredients

Caffeine Anhydrous, Theobromine Anhydrous, Yohimbine Anhydrous, Rauwolscine, Glycerine, vegetable cellulose, water, Polysorbate 80, FD&C Blue 1, FD&C Red 40, FD&C Yellow 6.

Usage

Take 1 Black Capsule in the morning and 1 capsule in the afternoon. Never take more than 2 servings within 24 hours of the timeline. For best results, consume a pill 30 minutes prior to a meal.
short_description:
Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules

Key Features:

  • Nutrex Lipo-6 Black Improves metabolism
  • Aids in faster fat-loss
  • Formulated as liquid capsules for faster absorption
  • Nutrex Lipo-6 Black concentrated fat-loss formula
  • Advantra Z for an increased metabolic rate
  • Theobromine Anhydrous eliminates toxins from your body
  • Nutrex Lipo-6 Black boosts concentration and focus for an effective weight loss session

name: NEED Pure Mass Gainer, 10 lbs
description:
NEED Pure Mass Gainer, 10 lbs

PURE MASS GAINER by NEED® is a clinically developed combination of nutrients focused on pure muscle growth. It´s exclusive next generation formula contains the best raw materials available and offers all the necessary ingredients to cover the energy requirements of any athlete.

It´s exclusive composition mixes 6 main groups of ingredients, including vitamins, minerals, protein, carbohydrates, creatine monohydrate and essential amino acids.

PURE MASS GAINER by NEED® advanced vitamins and minerals complex has been specially designed to contribute with all the necessary elements for a correct functioning of the body, helping with carbs breakdown.

Protein reduces muscular fatigue, keeps a balanced muscle activity and ensures efficient training sessions. PURE MASS GAINER by NEED® contains a balanced source of protein based on quality whey and SOLMIKO micellar casein, from Glanbia Nutritionals®, the perfect mix to secure a fast and lasting recovery.

Finally, the all-round PURE MASS GAINER by NEED® formula contains carbohydrates, creatine monohydrate and essential amino acids ensuring an extra muscle growth and recovery when combining regular training with the recommended daily dose.

Benefits

  • Increases Performance
  • Reduce Muscle Stress And Fatigue
  • Pure Muscle Mass Gain
  • Increases Physical Performance
  • Boost Endurance
  • Improves Training Efficiency

 Ingredients

Maltodextrin, Protein Mix (Whey (milk) protein concentrate (contains soy lecithin, as emulsifier), Micellar casein (total milk protein) Solmiko®), Defatted cocoa powder (10-12%), flavours, milk powder, Mineral mix (potassium phosphate, calcium citrate, sodium chloride, magnesium oxide, sodium selenite, ferrous fumarate, cupric gluconate, zinc oxide, manganese sulphate, chromium picolinate, potassium iodide), creatine monohydrate, medium chain triglycerides, L-Glutamine, Choline bitartrate, Inositol, Vitamin mix (L-Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C), Nicotinamide (Niacin), DL-alpha-tocopheryl acetate (Vitamin E), D-pantothenate calcium (Pantothenic acid), pyridoxine hydrochloride (Vitamin B6), retinyl acetate (vitamin A), riboflavin (viamin B2), thiamin hydrochloride (Vitamin B1), folic acid (pteroyimonoglutamic acid), D-Biotin (Biotin), Cholecalciferol (Vitamin D), Cyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12)), sweetener (sucralose).
short_description:
NEED Pure Mass Gainer, 10 lbs

Key Features:

  • NEED® PURE MASS GAINER is an advanced vitamins and minerals complex
  • Specially designed to contribute with all the necessary elements for a correct functioning of the body, helping with carbs breakdown.

name: Muscletech Cell Tech - 6 lbs
description:
Muscletech Performance Series Cell Tech - 6 lbs

  • CELL-TECH is a creatine formula that delivers a multi-stage combination of carbohydrates that forces a powerful insulin spike post-workout. The powerful carbohydrates trigger insulin output, enabling it to shuttle the massive 5g dose of creatine and other nutrients straight into the muscle. CELL-TECH contains a full 200mg dose of alpha lipoic acid (ALA). Research suggests that ALA helps improve the absorption of creatine and glucose into the muscle cell through specialized transporters. The transporters and increased muscle cell sensitivity allows insulin to rapidly replenish creatine and glycogen stores, facilitating glycogen super-compensation and an intense muscle-expanding effect. CELL-TECH also contains free-form amino acids that aid in this dramatic cell volumization!
  • CELL-TECH can be used by active men, women, fitness enthusiasts, high-performance athletes, powerlifters, crossfitters and bodybuilders. CELL-TECH is particularly effective for hardgainers – lifters who have trouble putting on size.

Muscletech Performance Series Cell Tech – 6 lbs

name: Sunline Alaska L-Arginine 90 Caps
description:
Sunline Alaska L-Arginine 1000 mg, 90 Capsules

  • Non-GMO
  • GMP Certified
  • Contionally Essential Amino Acid
  • Nitric Oxide Precursor*

Product description

L-Arginine is a conditionally essential basic amino acid involved primarily in urea metabolism and excretion, as well as in DNA synthesis and protein production.* It is an important precursor of Nitric Oxide (NO) and thus plays a role in the dilation of blood vessels.* The L-Arginine used in this product is Pharmaceutical Grade.
short_description:
Sunline Alaska L-Arginine 1000 mg, 90 Capsules

Product description

L-Arginine is a conditionally essential basic amino acid involved primarily in urea metabolism and excretion, as well as in DNA synthesis and protein production.* It is an important precursor of Nitric Oxide (NO) and thus plays a role in the dilation of blood vessels.* The L-Arginine used in this product is Pharmaceutical Grade.

name: Sunline Alaska CLA 90 Softgels
description:
Sunline Alaska Total Lean CLA 1000mg 90 Softgels

Product description

CLA (conjugated linoleic acid) is a class of fatty acids produced by animals that is naturally found in beef and dairy products. Although CLA plays an important role in a number of cellular metabolic processes, humans are not able to produce CLA and therefore can only obtain it from the diet.* Since CLA is generally more abundant in grazing animals, changes in agricultural practices have resulted in less CLA in our foods, decreasing its availability in modern diets. Therefore, using a CLA supplement is recommended to obtain desirable levels of CLA for its optimal effects.* Sunline Alaska CLA is derived from non-GMO safflower oil and delivers 800 mg CLA per softgel.
short_description:
Sunline Alaska CLA 90 Softgels

  • STIMULANT FREE WEIGHT MANAGEMENT
  • 1000 Mg Number of Servings 90 Softgels

name: Universal Nutrition, Carbo Plus, High-Energy Carbohydrate Drink, 1 kg
description:
Universal Nutrition, Carbo Plus, 2.2lbs (1 kg)

Carbo Plus Engineered for endurance and strength athletes alike. Carbo Plus™ fuels your body with pure complex carbohydrates without any added simple sugars, sweeteners, preservatives, fillers, or artificial flavors. Carbo Plus™ can function as an important source of energy for your working muscles during strenuous exercise. By training with Carbo Plus™, you can maximize the replenishment of glycogen in your muscle and liver. This translates into enhanced performance, faster muscle recovery, and higher endurance levels. 

Suggested Use

Dosage: Slowly blend 1 scoop of Carbo Plus™ into 8-10 oz of your beverage of choice. For best results, use at least twice daily and consume 1 serving within 2 hours of exercise. 

Other Ingredients

100% pure high performance complex carbohydrates (consisting of granulated medium length complex carbohydrates (glucose polymers) extracted from premium grain sources and maltodextrin). 

Made in a GMP facility on equipment that process milk, soy, egg, peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish, and wheat.

name: MusclePharm Carnitine Core Liquid Diet Supplement
description:
MusclePharm Carnitine Core Liquid Diet Supplement

Product description

MusclePharm Carnitine Core assists in transporting long-chain fatty acids into the mitochondria (the cells’ “power plant”) to make this process more effective. This amplifies an athlete’s ability to metabolize fat into muscular energy. While the body produces carnitine naturally, many athletes supplement their intake. Raspberry ketones act as a natural energy booster for anybody on a low-calorie diet.
short_description:
MusclePharm Carnitine Core Liquid Diet Supplement

  • Improved metabolism for weight loss: carnitine core capsules help transport long-chain fatty acids into the mitochondria to be metabolized for energy, enhancing weight loss
  • Helps reduce body fat : the mitochondria is the cell’s powerhouse it works to process fats into energy. Carnitine core capsules are used to expedite this process, which helps reduce body fat
  • Helps athletic performance and endurance: while the body produces carnitine naturally, athletes and workout enthusiasts can supplement their carnitine level with carnitine core capsules
  • Banned-substance tested: we care about the products you put into your body. Our carnitine core capsules are banned-substance tested and certified by informed-choice
